original: aa sho ka k'anta m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aa sho ka k'anta m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /

original: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: The means of achieving the light-ray-holding Aparajita

original: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la zla ba la mam yig ser po las byung ba'i mya ngan med pa'i shing de'i steng du mam /
analyzed: de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la zla ba la mam yig ser po las byung ba'i mya ngan med pa'i shing de'i steng du mam /
translated: Then, after meditating on emptiness, the syllable mam arises from a yellow mam syllable on the moon.🔽

original: de yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: She transforms into a yellow goddess with one face and two arms.🔽

original: mgon po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: mgon po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: Protector Vairocana wears a jeweled crown.🔽

original: gser lta bu'i phyag pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang / zla ba la 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i steng du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: gser lta bu'i phyag pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang / zla ba la 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i steng du bzhugs pa /
translated: On a multicolored lotus and moon disc behind the golden hands, he sits with a swaying gait.🔽

original: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga 'phyar ba phyag g-yon na bsnams pa /
analyzed: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga 'phyar ba phyag g-yon na bsnams pa /
translated: He holds in his left hand a branch of the aśoka tree.🔽

original: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
translated: His right hand is in the gesture of granting wishes.🔽

original: do shal la sogs pa sku la brgyan pa /
analyzed: do shal la sogs pa sku la brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with necklaces and so forth.🔽

original: lang tsho gzhon zhing mdzes pa 'di bzhin bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: lang tsho gzhon zhing mdzes pa 'di bzhin bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate in this way, with youth, beauty, and so forth.

original: snying ga'i mam yig gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas mgo dang bcas pa'i phag gi tshogs kyis gdug pa can brlag ste /
analyzed: snying ga'i mam yig gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas mgo dang bcas pa'i phag gi tshogs kyis gdug pa can brlag ste /
translated: Light rays shine from the seed syllable mam in the heart, and a host of pigs with heads destroy the wicked.

original: @167a * // sems can dpag tu med pa'i don sna tshogs byed pa'o //
analyzed: @167a * // sems can dpag tu med pa'i don sna tshogs byed pa'o //
translated: They perform various kinds of benefit for immeasurable sentient beings.

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am sv'a h'a /

original: zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for recitation.

original: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Mārajitā, the Uḍḍiyāna Tārā, is complete.
